shift.controller

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • shift.controller.AuthenticationController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/auth")
public class AuthenticationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides endpoints for token generation and registering users

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/token/generate-token")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity login(@RequestBody
                                                                                                 UserLogin userLogin)
                                                                                          throws org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException
        Gets a generated token for the user logging in.
        Parameters:
        userLogin - UserLogin object for signing in
        Returns:
        A JWT token
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException - If the username and/or password is invalid

      • register

        @PostMapping(value="/register")
public java.lang.String register(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                 @Valid Registration registration)
                                                          throws java.lang.SecurityException
        Registers a user to use the application.
        Parameters:
        registration - Registration object for registering the user
        Returns:
        A success message
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - when the given username already exists
